tool_description: An easy way to view all perk data within the game Dead By Daylight.
name: Dead By Daylight Perk Data
title: Dead By Daylight Perk Data

api_list.name: Perk
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dead-by-daylight-perk-data.p.rapidapi.com/perk/Alert/false"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dead-by-daylight-perk-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dead-by-daylight-perk-data.p.rapidapi.com/perk/{perk}/{clean}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dead-by-daylight-perk-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Perk Search
api_list.description: Allows you to search for perks based on a search term. If you want to find all perks that apply expose, this is the place to do it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dead-by-daylight-perk-data.p.rapidapi.com/perkSearch/expose/false"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dead-by-daylight-perk-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
